statements: SELECT * FROM emissions_data
SELECT industry_id, carbon_emission FROM emissions_data WHERE region_id = 1
SELECT region_id, SUM(carbon_emission) AS total_carbon_emission FROM emissions_data GROUP BY region_id
SELECT * FROM emissions_data WHERE emission_year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2015 ORDER BY carbon_emission DESC
SELECT industry_id, AVG(methane_emission) AS avg_methane_emission FROM emissions_data GROUP BY industry_id HAVING AVG(methane_emission) > 50
SELECT * FROM emissions_data WHERE carbon_emission > 100 AND region_id = 1
SELECT industry_id, SUM(carbon_emission) AS total_carbon_emission FROM emissions_data GROUP BY industry_id
SELECT region_id, AVG(methane_emission) AS avg_methane_emission FROM emissions_data WHERE emission_year BETWEEN 2000 AND 2010 GROUP BY region_id
SELECT DISTINCT industry_id, SUM(nitrous_oxide_emission) AS total_nitrous_oxide_emission FROM emissions_data WHERE carbon_emission > 50 GROUP BY industry_id
SELECT * FROM emissions_data WHERE carbon_emission < 50 ORDER BY emission_year DESC, region_id ASC
SELECT * FROM greenhouse_emissions;
SELECT industry, region, emission_value FROM greenhouse_emissions;
SELECT * FROM emission_sources WHERE emission_value > 100;
SELECT source_name, emission_category FROM emission_sources ORDER BY source_name DESC;
SELECT industry, SUM(emission_value) AS total_emissions FROM greenhouse_emissions GROUP BY industry;
SELECT * FROM greenhouse_emissions WHERE region = 'Europe' ORDER BY emission_value DESC;
SELECT industry, AVG(emission_value) AS avg_emission FROM greenhouse_emissions GROUP BY industry;
SELECT region, SUM(emission_value) AS total_emission FROM greenhouse_emissions GROUP BY region ORDER BY total_emission DESC;
SELECT * FROM emission_sources WHERE emission_category IN ('Transportation', 'Agriculture') ORDER BY source_name ASC;
SELECT industry, COUNT(*) AS total_sources FROM greenhouse_emissions GROUP BY industry HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_sources DESC;
SELECT * FROM industry_emissions ORDER BY industry_name DESC, region ASC
SELECT industry_name, emission_kg FROM industry_emissions WHERE region = 'Europe'
SELECT MAX(emission_kg) AS max_emission FROM industry_emissions
SELECT industry_name, SUM(emission_kg) AS total_emission FROM industry_emissions GROUP BY industry_name
SELECT region_name, country FROM region_details WHERE population > 10000000 ORDER BY country
SELECT * FROM emissions_data ORDER BY emission_date DESC, emission_amount ASC
SELECT industry_name, region, SUM(emission_kg) AS total_emission FROM industry_emissions GROUP BY industry_name, region HAVING total_emission > 1000 ORDER BY total_emission DESC

SELECT industry_name, region, emission_date FROM industry_emissions JOIN emissions_data ON industry_emissions.industry_id = emissions_data.industry_id WHERE emission_amount > 5000 ORDER BY emission_date ASC
SELECT * FROM region_details WHERE population > 500000 ORDER BY country ASC, region_name DESC

SELECT industry_name, region, emission_amount FROM industry_emissions JOIN emissions_data ON industry_emissions.industry_id = emissions_data.industry_id WHERE emission_amount <= 3000 ORDER BY region ASC, emission_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM industries;
SELECT industry_name, location FROM industries WHERE industry_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM emissions WHERE emission_quantity > 1000;
SELECT region_name, region_population FROM regions ORDER BY region_population DESC;
SELECT industry_name, emission_quantity FROM industries JOIN emissions ON industries.industry_id = emissions.industry_id;
SELECT * FROM industries WHERE location = 'USA';
SELECT region_name, region_population FROM regions ORDER BY region_population DESC;

SELECT industry_name, emission_quantity FROM industries JOIN emissions ON industries.industry_id = emissions.industry_id WHERE emission_quantity > 1000 AND emission_date BETWEEN '2019-01-01' AND '2020-01-01';
SELECT * FROM emissions_impact JOIN regions ON emissions_impact.region_id = regions.region_id WHERE emission_impact LIKE '%negative%' ORDER BY region_name ASC;
SELECT industry_name, COUNT(*) AS total_emissions FROM industries JOIN emissions ON industries.industry_id = emissions.industry_id GROUP BY industry_name ORDER BY total_emissions DESC;
SELECT * FROM industry;
SELECT industry_name, industry_sector FROM industry ORDER BY industry_sector DESC;
SELECT industry_name, emission_level FROM emissions_data WHERE emission_level > 100;
SELECT region_name, region_location FROM region WHERE region_location = 'Europe';
SELECT * FROM climate_change_report ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM industry WHERE industry_sector = 'Technology';
SELECT industry_name, industry_sector FROM industry ORDER BY industry_name DESC;
SELECT region_name, COUNT(*) FROM region GROUP BY region_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;

SELECT industry_name, region_name, emission_level FROM industry JOIN emissions_data ON industry.industry_id = emissions_data.industry_id JOIN region ON emissions_data.region_id = region.region_id WHERE emission_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT * FROM climate_impact WHERE impact_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01' ORDER BY data_id ASC;
